text: (Rangarirai) apo Allah vakati: “Iwe Isa (Jesu)! Zvirokwazvo, ndichaita kuti urare uye ndova ndokutakura wouya kwandiri, uye ndova ndinokuchenura kubva kune avo vasingatendi (manyepo avo ekuti Jesu ndimwanakomana waAllah), uye ndichaita kuti avo vanokutevera (vanotenda muhumwechete hwaAllah) vave pamusoro peavo vasingatendi kusvika zuva rekumutswa. Uye muchava munodzoka kwandiri uye ndichatonga pakati penyu pane izvo maipokana.”
